title: Senate Confirms Shalanda Young to Lead OMB
sub_head: Agency official becomes first Black woman to serve as director of the Office of Management and Budget
body:
WASHINGTONâ€”The Senate confirmed Shalanda Young on Tuesday to be the director of the Office of Management and Budget, the first Black woman to hold the position.
Ms. Young, who has served as the acting director of the agency, was confirmed in a 61-36 vote.
